column2:
"Oh, that's surprising!
I thought you'd just run
off since you're a hack."

"It'll be good for a rookie like you to go on a mission
like this. Maybe it'll even toughen you up."

"Or maybe you'll just get killed. Who can say?
Either way, I look forward to finding out."

"あら、意外！
アンタ、へっぽこぴーだから
逃げ出すと思ってたのに。"

"でも、新米ならやっておいて
損はないと思うわよ。"

"ていうか、やんなきゃダメ！
でも、どうなることかしら……"
